message: I'm being generous, but let's be realistic.  I need most of the money to make the most of it.  Take what you can get.
Meet me halfway, let's share it fairly
I'm willing to compromise, but I still need the majority to make this worthwhile.  This is my final offer.
Take a smaller share, but still a significant one, to move forward
This is my last chance to get a decent share. I need a good chunk of the money to make this work.  Let's be reasonable.
I'm willing to give you a smaller share, but I need to get a significant portion to make it worth my while
We're running out of time, and the value of the money is dropping rapidly. This is my final offer, and I think it's fair considering the circumstances.  Let's make a deal before it's too late.
I'm not getting any younger, and I need a decent chunk to live comfortably. Take what's left, but I'm not giving up much more
This is my last chance.  The value of the money is plummeting, and I'm barely getting anything.  This offer is as generous as I can be. Let's make a deal before we both lose everything.
I'm not budging, take what's left, it's better than nothing
This is our last chance. We're both losing money rapidly. We can either split the remaining value evenly or get nothing. Let's end this now.
